name: Quick Chicken Stir Fry
description: A fast and healthy weeknight dinner loaded with colorful vegetables
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Slice chicken into thin strips and season with salt and pepper
Heat oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat
Cook chicken until golden, about 5 minutes, then set aside
Stir fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender
Return chicken to pan, add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger
Toss everything together and serve over rice

name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Rich and hearty Italian meat sauce over pasta
instructions: Finely dice onion, carrot, and celery
Heat olive oil and sauté vegetables until soft, about 8 minutes
Add ground beef and cook until browned
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute
Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 30 minutes
Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Serve sauce over pasta with grated parmesan

name: Creamy Vegetable Curry
description: A fragrant and satisfying vegan curry with coconut milk
instructions: Dice sweet potatoes and onion
Sauté onion until translucent, add garlic and ginger
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute
Add sweet potatoes and coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes
Add chickpeas and cook until sweet potatoes are tender
Stir in spinach until wilted
Serve over rice

name: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon
description: Light and flavorful salmon with fresh herbs
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and dill
Brush salmon with herb mixture
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side
Grill asparagus alongside for 3-4 minutes
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Classic Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with all the fixings
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet, drain excess fat
Add taco seasoning and water as directed
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened
Warm taco shells in oven
Dice tomatoes and shred lettuce
Assemble tacos with meat and toppings

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
description: Rich and creamy Italian rice dish with earthy mushrooms
instructions: Warm broth in a saucepan and keep hot
Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden, set aside
Cook shallots until soft, add rice and toast 2 minutes
Add wine and stir until absorbed
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
When rice is creamy, stir in mushrooms, parmesan, and thyme
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic Caesar salad topped with juicy grilled chicken
instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper, and olive oil
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through
Let chicken rest, then slice
Chop romaine and place in large bowl
Toss with dressing and croutons
Top with sliced chicken, parmesan, and lemon wedge

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp in a garlicky white wine butter sauce
instructions: Cook linguine according to package directions
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes
Add wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes
Toss with pasta and parsley

name: Homemade Black Bean Burgers
description: Hearty vegetarian burgers packed with flavor
instructions: Drain and rinse black beans
Mash beans in a bowl, leaving some chunks
Sauté onion and garlic until soft
Mix beans with breadcrumbs, onion mixture, and cumin
Form into 4 patties
Cook in oiled pan 4-5 minutes per side
Serve on buns with avocado, lettuce, and tomato

name: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl
description: Sweet and savory chicken over rice with vegetables
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Cook chicken in skillet until golden
Add teriyaki sauce and simmer until chicken is glazed
Steam broccoli and slice carrots
Serve chicken over rice with vegetables
Top with sesame seeds and green onions

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Simple Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 500°F with pizza stone if available
Stretch dough into 12-inch circle
Blend tomatoes with garlic for sauce
Spread thin layer of sauce on dough
Tear mozzarella and distribute over pizza
Bake 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
Top with fresh basil and drizzle of olive oil

name: Thai Peanut Noodles
description: Creamy peanut sauce over noodles with crunchy vegetables
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package, rinse with cold water
Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and warm water
Shred cabbage and julienne carrots
Toss noodles with peanut sauce
Top with vegetables and chopped peanuts
Garnish with green onions

name: Hearty Beef Stew
description: Comforting slow-cooked beef with tender vegetables
instructions: Cut beef into 2-inch cubes, season and coat with flour
Brown beef in batches in a Dutch oven
Sauté onion, then add tomato paste
Return beef, add broth and thyme
Simmer covered for 1 hour
Add potatoes, carrots, and celery
Continue cooking until vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes

name: Fresh Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4-inch rounds
Arrange alternating slices on a platter
Tuck basil leaves between slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze
Season with salt and pepper

name: Honey Garlic Chicken
description: Sweet and savory glazed chicken thighs
instructions: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper
Sear chicken skin-side down until golden, about 8 minutes
Flip and cook another 5 minutes
Mix honey, soy sauce, and minced garlic
Add sauce to pan and simmer until chicken is glazed
Steam green beans and serve alongside

name: Baja Fish Tacos
description: Crispy fish tacos with creamy slaw and lime
instructions: Mix flour with cumin and salt
Coat fish pieces in flour mixture
Fry fish until golden and crispy
Make slaw with cabbage, lime juice, and cilantro
Mix sour cream with lime zest for crema
Warm tortillas and assemble tacos

name: Quick Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Restaurant-style fried rice made at home
instructions: Use day-old cold rice for best results
Scramble eggs in hot wok, set aside
Stir-fry diced carrots and peas until tender
Add rice and toss on high heat
Add soy sauce and sesame oil
Mix in eggs and green onions

name: Traditional Greek Salad
description: Refreshing Mediterranean salad with feta and olives
instructions: Cut cucumber and tomatoes into chunks
Thinly slice red onion
Combine vegetables in a large bowl
Add olives and crumbled feta
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and oregano
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss gently

name: Pan-Seared Pork Chops
description: Juicy pork chops with a herb butter finish
instructions: Let pork chops come to room temperature
Season generously with salt and pepper
Heat oil in a cast iron skillet over high heat
Sear chops 4-5 minutes per side
Add butter, rosemary, and garlic to pan
Baste chops with herb butter
Rest 5 minutes before serving with mashed potatoes

name: Classic Minestrone Soup
description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans
instructions: Dice onion, carrot, celery, and zucchini
Sauté onion until soft, add garlic
Add remaining vegetables and cook 5 minutes
Pour in broth and tomatoes, bring to boil
Simmer 20 minutes
Add pasta and beans, cook until pasta is tender
Serve topped with fresh basil

name: Slow Cooker BBQ Pulled Pork
description: Tender, smoky pulled pork perfect for sandwiches
instructions: Mix paprika, garlic powder, brown sugar, salt, and pepper
Rub spice mixture all over pork shoulder
Place in slow cooker with vinegar
Cook on low for 8 hours
Shred pork with two forks
Mix with BBQ sauce
Serve on buns topped with coleslaw

name: Creamy Lemon Chicken Pasta
description: Light and zesty pasta with tender chicken
instructions: Cook pasta according to package, reserve pasta water
Season and cook chicken, then slice
Melt butter, sauté garlic until fragrant
Add cream and simmer 3 minutes
Stir in parmesan and lemon juice
Toss pasta with sauce, adding pasta water as needed
Top with chicken and parsley

name: Shakshuka
description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce
instructions: Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft
Add garlic, cumin, and paprika
Pour in tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes
Create wells and crack eggs into sauce
Cover and cook until eggs are set, about 8 minutes
Garnish with cilantro and serve with bread

name: Baked Ziti
description: Cheesy baked pasta with ricotta and marinara
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Cook ziti until just al dente
Mix ricotta with egg, half the mozzarella, and parmesan
Layer pasta, ricotta mixture, and marinara in baking dish
Top with remaining mozzarella
Bake covered 25 minutes, then uncovered 15 minutes
Let rest 10 minutes before serving with basil

name: Chicken Burrito Bowl
description: Customizable Tex-Mex bowl with all your favorite toppings
instructions: Season chicken with cumin, salt, and pepper
Grill or pan-sear chicken, then slice
Cook rice with lime juice and cilantro
Heat black beans and corn
Dice tomatoes and slice avocado
Assemble bowls with rice, chicken, and toppings
Garnish with cheese and extra lime

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp
instructions: Bring broth to boil with smashed lemongrass
Add sliced mushrooms and chilies
Simmer 10 minutes to infuse flavors
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Remove from heat, add fish sauce and lime juice
Adjust seasoning and garnish with cilantro

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers filled with seasoned beef and rice
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds
Cook rice according to package
Brown beef with onion and garlic
Mix beef, rice, half the tomatoes, and seasonings
Fill peppers and place in baking dish
Pour remaining tomatoes around peppers
Bake 40 minutes, top with cheese, bake 5 more minutes

name: Classic Pad Thai
description: Sweet, sour, and savory Thai noodle dish
instructions: Soak noodles in warm water until pliable
Mix fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar for sauce
Cook shrimp in hot wok, set aside
Scramble eggs, set aside
Stir-fry drained noodles with sauce
Add shrimp, eggs, and bean sprouts
Serve with peanuts, green onions, and lime

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes
Grill or broil chicken until charred
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until soft
Add tomatoes and garam masala, simmer 10 minutes
Stir in cream and add chicken
Simmer until sauce thickens
Serve with rice and naan

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Crispy breaded eggplant layered with cheese and marinara
instructions: Slice eggplant and salt to draw out moisture
Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs
Bread eggplant slices and bake at 400°F until golden
Layer in baking dish: sauce, eggplant, cheese
Repeat layers and top with cheese
Bake at 375°F until bubbly
Top with fresh basil before serving

name: Asian Chicken Lettuce Wraps
description: Savory chicken in crisp lettuce cups
instructions: Cook ground chicken until no longer pink
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute
Stir in diced water chestnuts
Add soy sauce, hoisin, and rice vinegar
Cook until sauce thickens
Separate lettuce leaves into cups
Fill cups with chicken mixture and top with green onions

name: Mediterranean Roasted Vegetable Bowl
description: Colorful roasted vegetables with quinoa and tahini
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package
Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces
Toss with olive oil and roast at 425°F for 30 minutes
Mix tahini with lemon juice and water for dressing
Assemble bowls with quinoa and roasted vegetables
Drizzle with tahini dressing

name: Coconut Curry Shrimp
description: Creamy Thai-style curry with plump shrimp
instructions: Cook rice according to package
Sauté curry paste for 1 minute until fragrant
Add coconut milk, fish sauce, and sugar
Add vegetables and simmer 5 minutes
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Serve over rice with fresh basil

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
description: Fluffy eggs filled with spinach and tangy feta
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper
Melt butter in nonstick pan over medium heat
Pour in eggs and cook until edges set
Add spinach and feta to one half
Fold omelette and cook 1 more minute
Serve with halved cherry tomatoes

name: Beef and Broccoli
description: Chinese takeout favorite made at home
instructions: Slice beef thinly against the grain
Marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch
Cook rice according to package
Stir-fry beef in hot wok until browned, set aside
Stir-fry broccoli with garlic and ginger
Add oyster sauce and beef back to wok
Serve over rice

name: Creamy Butternut Squash Soup
description: Velvety smooth soup with warming spices
instructions: Peel and cube butternut squash
Sauté onion until soft, add garlic
Add squash and broth, bring to boil
Simmer until squash is tender, about 25 minutes
Blend until smooth
Stir in coconut milk, maple syrup, and nutmeg
Serve with crusty bread

name: Italian Meatball Subs
description: Tender meatballs in marinara on crusty rolls
instructions: Mix beef and sausage with breadcrumbs, egg, and parmesan
Form into 16 meatballs
Bake at 400°F for 20 minutes
Simmer meatballs in marinara sauce
Toast hoagie rolls
Fill with meatballs and sauce
Top with mozzarella and broil until melted

name: Salmon Fried Rice
description: Flaky salmon tossed with vegetables and rice
instructions: Season and bake salmon at 400°F for 12 minutes
Flake salmon with fork
Use day-old rice for best results
Scramble eggs in hot wok, set aside
Stir-fry diced carrots and peas
Add rice and soy sauce
Fold in salmon and eggs, drizzle with sesame oil

name: Homemade Falafel Pita
description: Crispy falafel in warm pita with fresh veggies
instructions: Blend chickpeas with parsley, garlic, and cumin
Form mixture into small patties
Pan-fry falafel until golden on both sides
Make tahini sauce with lemon juice and water
Dice cucumber, tomatoes, and onion
Warm pita bread
Fill pita with falafel, veggies, and tahini sauce

name: Chicken Pot Pie
description: Comfort food classic with flaky crust
instructions: Poach chicken in broth, then shred
Sauté onion in butter until soft
Add flour and cook 1 minute
Slowly add broth and cream, stirring constantly
Add chicken, vegetables, and thyme
Line pie dish with crust, add filling
Top with second crust, crimp edges
Bake at 400°F for 35-40 minutes until golden

name: Ahi Tuna Poke Bowl
description: Hawaiian-inspired bowl with fresh tuna
instructions: Cook sushi rice with rice vinegar
Cube tuna and toss with soy sauce and sesame oil
Slice cucumber and avocado
Cook edamame according to package
Assemble bowls with rice as base
Arrange tuna and toppings
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds

name: Greek Lamb Gyros
description: Spiced lamb in warm pita with tzatziki
instructions: Mix lamb with oregano, cumin, and garlic
Form into small patties or a large loaf
Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes
Make tzatziki: grate cucumber, mix with yogurt, garlic, dill
Slice tomatoes and onion
Warm pita and slice lamb
Assemble gyros with tzatziki and vegetables

name: Cauliflower Mac and Cheese
description: Healthier twist on the classic comfort food
instructions: Cut cauliflower into florets and steam until tender
Cook pasta according to package
Make cheese sauce with milk, cream cheese, and cheddar
Combine pasta and cauliflower with sauce
Pour into baking dish
Top with breadcrumbs and butter
Bake at 375°F until golden and bubbly

name: Korean Bibimbap
description: Colorful rice bowl with vegetables and egg
instructions: Cook rice and keep warm
Season beef with soy sauce and cook
Sauté each vegetable separately with sesame oil
Blanch spinach and bean sprouts
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Arrange rice in bowls, top with vegetables and beef
Add egg and serve with gochujang

name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
description: Zesty grilled shrimp with mango salsa
instructions: Marinate shrimp with lime juice and cumin
Make mango salsa: dice mango, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, lime
Grill shrimp until pink, about 2 minutes per side
Warm tortillas on grill
Shred cabbage for slaw
Assemble tacos with shrimp, slaw, and salsa

name: Loaded Veggie Quesadillas
description: Crispy tortillas stuffed with vegetables and cheese
instructions: Slice peppers, onion, and mushrooms
Sauté vegetables until tender
Drain and rinse black beans
Layer cheese, vegetables, and beans on tortilla
Top with another tortilla
Cook in skillet until golden on both sides
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa and sour cream

name: Honey Glazed Ham
description: Sweet and savory baked ham for special occasions
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F
Score ham in diamond pattern
Insert cloves at intersections
Mix honey, brown sugar, mustard, and vinegar
Brush glaze over ham
Bake for 2 hours, glazing every 30 minutes
Rest 15 minutes before slicing

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Light pasta with fresh spring vegetables in garlic olive oil
instructions: Cook pasta according to package, reserve pasta water
Slice zucchini and squash into half moons
Sauté vegetables in olive oil until tender
Add garlic and halved cherry tomatoes
Toss with pasta and pasta water
Top with parmesan and fresh basil

name: Turkey Meatballs in Marinara
description: Lean turkey meatballs simmered in tomato sauce
instructions: Mix turkey with breadcrumbs, egg, garlic, and seasoning
Form into 20 meatballs
Brown meatballs in skillet
Add marinara and simmer 15 minutes
Cook spaghetti according to package
Serve meatballs and sauce over pasta

name: Loaded Avocado Toast
description: Trendy breakfast toast with eggs and toppings
instructions: Toast sourdough bread until golden
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Spread avocado on toast
Poach or fry eggs to desired doneness
Top toast with eggs and halved tomatoes
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes

name: Moroccan Chickpea Stew
description: Aromatic stew with warming spices and dried fruit
instructions: Dice sweet potatoes and chop apricots
Sauté onion, add cumin and cinnamon
Add sweet potatoes, tomatoes, and broth
Simmer 20 minutes until potatoes are tender
Add chickpeas and apricots, cook 10 more minutes
Prepare couscous according to package
Serve stew over couscous with cilantro
